## Checklist

Before submitting, make sure:

- [ ] My game is in `games/<my-game>/`
- [ ] I have a `game.json` with valid metadata
- [ ] I have a `README.md`
- [ ] My game runs with `pnpm game <my-game>`
- [ ] My game doesn't require secrets or API keys
- [ ] My game doesn't break other games
- [ ] My PR only touches `games/<my-game>/`
